name: Guinness Draught
description: A smooth and creamy stout with roasted malt flavors.

name: Sierra Nevada Pale Ale
description: A classic American pale ale with pine and citrus notes.

name: Heineken
description: A crisp and refreshing European lager.

name: Dogfish Head 90 Minute IPA
description: A bold and hoppy IPA with a strong malt backbone.

name: Pliny the Elder
description: A legendary double IPA with intense pine and citrus flavors.

name: Founders Kentucky Breakfast Stout
description: A rich and boozy stout aged in bourbon barrels with coffee and chocolate flavors.

name: Allagash White
description: A refreshing Belgian-style wheat beer with notes of orange peel and coriander.

name: Weihenstephaner Hefeweissbier
description: A classic German wheat beer with banana and clove aromas.

name: Chimay Blue
description: A rich and complex Belgian ale with dark fruit and caramel flavors.

name: Westvleteren 12
description: A legendary Trappist beer with deep caramel and dark fruit notes.

name: Modelo Especial
description: A smooth, crisp, and well-balanced Mexican lager.

name: Blue Moon Belgian White
description: A smooth wheat beer with hints of orange and coriander.

name: Lagunitas IPA
description: A well-balanced IPA with citrus and pine hop flavors.

description: A bold, aggressive ale with caramel malt and strong hop bitterness.

name: Bell's Two Hearted Ale
description: A well-balanced IPA with floral and citrusy hop flavors.

name: Samuel Adams Boston Lager
description: A full-bodied lager with caramel and toasty malt flavors.

name: Hoegaarden
description: A classic Belgian wheat beer with citrus and coriander spice.

name: Deschutes Black Butte Porter
description: A smooth and malty porter with hints of chocolate and coffee.

name: Pilsner Urquell
description: The original Pilsner with a crisp, clean malt profile and noble hop bitterness.

description: A hoppy American pale ale with pine and citrus notes.
